title: How to Take Out the Paradise Falls Slavers in Fallout 3

steps.headline: Equip at least medium armor (merc armor if you have it).
steps.description: Make sure it is in good condition.

steps.headline: Bring along a hunting rifle/sniper rifle, an assault rifle, and at least 10 mines (of any kind).
Travel to Paradise Falls.
steps.description: At the entrance, crouch until you are hidden behind Grouse.

steps.headline: Kill Grouse and the other guard.
steps.description: Move up to the gate, and enter the inner area.

steps.headline: Quickly bring out the mines.
steps.description: Toss them out, spread across the land in front of the fence.

steps.headline: Hide behind the fence as any nearby slavers approach.
steps.description: Let the mines do their work, and finish off any left with an assault rifle.

steps.headline: Look around to ensure that all close-combat enemies have been vanquished.
steps.description: Bring out the hunting rifle/sniper rifle.

steps.headline: Kill the lookout that's carrying a minigun.
Move to Cutter's Clinic.
steps.description: Go inside and kill Cutter. Come back and rest whenever your health is low.

steps.headline: Move throughout Paradise Falls, killing the slavers.
steps.description: Make sure to kill the leaders as well.

steps.headline: Clean up.
steps.description: Loot armor, weapons, and goods. Free the slaves, and leave.

text: Equip at least medium armor (merc armor if you have it). Make sure it is in good condition. Bring along a hunting rifle/sniper rifle, an assault rifle, and at least 10 mines (of any kind).  Travel to Paradise Falls. At the entrance, crouch until you are hidden behind Grouse. Kill Grouse and the other guard. Move up to the gate, and enter the inner area. Quickly bring out the mines. Toss them out, spread across the land in front of the fence. Hide behind the fence as any nearby slavers approach. Let the mines do their work, and finish off any left with an assault rifle. Look around to ensure that all close-combat enemies have been vanquished. Bring out the hunting rifle/sniper rifle. Kill the lookout that's carrying a minigun. Take cover when needed. Move to Cutter's Clinic. Go inside and kill Cutter. Come back and rest whenever your health is low. Move throughout Paradise Falls, killing the slavers. Make sure to kill the leaders as well. Clean up. Loot armor, weapons, and goods. Free the slaves, and leave.
